alert.note: Alert for Osage; Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 10:28PM CDT until May 17 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Shawnee County in east central Kansas... Northeastern Osage County in east central Kansas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1028 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Meriden to near Carbondale, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Topeka, Carbondale, Tecumseh, Richland, Overbrook, Scranton, Pauline, Berryton and Pomona Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 354 and 355. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 168 and 188. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
